Icons

Place vector icons anywhere using our SVG sprite generator.

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

  <span class="o-icon o-icon--bell">
    <svg viewbox="0 0 1 1">
      <use xlink:href="/assets/images/icons.svg#bell"></use>
    </svg>
  </span>
